full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I RIM PA DANG PO'I DMAR 'KHRID ZAB MO NYAMS SU LEN TSUL YONGS 'DZIN BLA MA'I GSUNG BZHIN 'KHRUL MED ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(DE LTAR DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I RIM PA DANG PO'I LAM LA 'KHRID TSUL YONGS 'DZIN BLA MA'I GSUNG BZHIN 'KHRUL MED ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA 'DI NI 'KHOR GYI THA MA PHYED LNGA'I NANG TSAN SLOB MA'I THA SHAL SIDDHIS MING CAN GYIS PAS KYANG @028B BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE BA 'DI YIS 'GRO BA KUN, ,GSHIN RJE'I GSHED PO 'GRUB GYUR NAS, ,'GRO BA GCIG KYANG MA LUS PA, ,KHYED KYI SA LA 'GOD PAR SHOG , ,,DZA YANTU, ,)
